name: Jump and Sneak
description:
Find the keys in a dark world and don't be found by the enemies.

Controls

The controls are very easy. You move with W, A, S and D or with the arrow buttons. You jump with the space bar and you sneak with the shift button. When you sneak, the camera zooms out and your light gets darker.

Enemies

In this game it has 3 enemies. The first on is a lampe, that lights up every 10 seconds and you not allowed to get in the light. The second is a robot that moves on the ground. You also not allowed to get in the light. The last enemie is a spicks that you are not allowed to touch. You can see the enemies in the dark, because of the red light that blinks.

But now have fun with this game.
